### Effortless Setup

Get your professional portfolio up and running in minutes with our streamlined CLI:

<Steps>

<Step>Initiate the installation process with a single command:</Step>

```bash
npx nyxb@latest template
```

<Step>Follow the intuitive prompts:</Step>
   - Select the feature-rich `portfolio` template.
   - Choose a name for your project directory.
   - Pick your preferred package manager (npm, pnpm, yarn, or bun).

<Step>Let our CLI handle the heavy lifting, downloading the template, installing dependencies, and optionally setting up a git repository.</Step>

<Step>Navigate to your new project and launch the development server:</Step>

```bash-session
cd <your-project-directory>
<package-manager> run dev
```
</Steps>

### Elevate Your Online Presence

This comprehensive portfolio template is designed to showcase your professional journey, skills, and achievements in a visually stunning and engaging manner. It's the perfect tool to make a lasting impression on potential employers, clients, or collaborators.

### Why This Template Stands Out

- ✅ Save countless hours on design and development
- ✅ Leverage sophisticated animations without the learning curve
- ✅ Enjoy unparalleled customization options
- ✅ Experience hassle-free setup with 1-click download
- ✅ Personalize your portfolio in minutes
- ✅ Deploy instantly with Vercel or self-host effortlessly using Coolify

### Comprehensive Features

- Eye-catching Hero Section
- Engaging About Section
- Impressive Work Experience Showcase
- Detailed Education Timeline
- Dynamic Projects Gallery
- Hackathon Achievements Highlight
- Professional Contact Section
- Integrated Blog for Sharing Insights
